coreAttributes.authorTag: 'MFD by DSG Novelty Co.' is printed around one of the sphere's poles.
coreAttributes.name: Mystical Orb of Fate
coreAttributes.description: Supposedly a powerful arcane artefact capable of seeing into the future, it is actually just a novelty toy. Inside its spherical plastic shell, an icosahedral die floats in alcohol. The small window allows the wielder to view a random answer inscribed on the die as it floats up.
coreAttributes.applyEffects: A blue triangle floats up into view. Upon its surface, the inscription reads: "[style.random(Certainly|Decidedly|No doubt|Definitely|Count on it|I see it is so|Most likely|A high chance|Yes|Signs are good|Too horny, try again|Try again later|Answer delayed|Uncertain|Masturbate and try again|Doubtful|No|Don't rely on it|Sources say no|Bad signs)]."

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] gingerly [npc.verb(shake)] the orb before peering into its murky depths...
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(shake)] the orb before turning the window on it towards [npc2.name] so that [npc2.she] can peer into its murky depths...
